title: Chlorpromazine
summary: Chlorpromazine (CPZ), marketed under the brand names Thorazine and Largactil among others, is an antipsychotic medication.[4] It is primarily used to treat psychotic disorders such as schizophrenia.[4] Other uses include the treatment of bipolar disorder, severe behavioral problems in children including those with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, nausea and vomiting, anxiety before surgery, and hiccups that do not improve following other measures.[4] It can be given by mouth, by injection into a muscle, or into a vein.[4]
